nodes.text: A pike was a type of polearm weapon employed in the culture of the Nightsisters and Nightbrothers of Dathomir. Savage Opress was given a pike by Mother Talzin, drawn forth from spirit ichor, that was said to be enchanted with their most potent magic. Pikes were also used by Dolandu who lived in the mountains of Skalokor. One was used by Jedi Master Niquon to protect himself from a drethi attack.
